name: Eggs with Legs
description:
WELCOME TO “EGGS WITH LEGS”

The farm chicks are upset with their eggs being stolen! They want to keep their babies alive and it is up to you to rescue them! Retrieve as many eggs as you can but watch out for the farmers…

***Talk to the Mechanic Mother Chick to buy parts, get repairs and bank eggs!***

CONTROLS ControlActionWASDMoveMouseAimLeft clickShoot left gun (Buy item)Right clickShoot right gun (Sell item)EInteract (Talk to chick for parts and repairs, get on the truck to move on to next level) OVERVIEW

COLLECT the stolen eggs! PROTECT them from bullets! EXCHANGE eggs for parts! REPAIR regularly! PLAN your parts’ placement! SAVE THE CHICKS!

DEVELOPMENT

Our first game made together as a pair and the very first game ever for @teto and we may have been a little too ambitious! Worked like mad for the whole 3 days and produced a ridiculous amount of content although there were a few bits we had intended to include that we had to cut out.

Written code and sfx all done by @ciaranw . Graphics and level design by @teto . Animation, concept and everything else was an awesome joint effort!

TOOLS

Engine: Godot
Graphics: Krita
Sound: Audacity

THANKS FOR PLAYING AND ENJOY!

Post-release Changelog

Show ‘E’ interact marker even when not in range
Hook up unconnected ‘egg splat’ sound for basket hit
Fix egg counter slipping under 0 when losing eggs you didn’t have
Add extremely simple game over notification
